editorialSummary.text: Airy quarters in an upscale hotel featuring a sophisticated restaurant, an indoor pool & a gym.

text.text:
The Taj Skyline Hotel in Ahmedabad is truly a gem! From the moment I stepped into the lobby, I knew I was in for a treat. The stunning architecture, impeccable decor, and warm hospitality set the tone for a fantastic stay.

The rooms were spacious, elegant, and meticulously maintained, offering breathtaking views of the city. The amenities were top-notch, with a fantastic fitness center, an inviting pool, and exceptional dining options.

The service was outstanding – the staff were attentive, friendly, and went above and beyond to ensure my needs were met. Whether it was a quick check-in or a special request, they made everything seamless.

The hotel's location is also noteworthy, providing easy access to key attractions and business hubs. I appreciated the thoughtful touches throughout the property, from the beautifully landscaped gardens to the carefully curated artwork.

Overall, my stay at the Taj Skyline was nothing short of exceptional. It's an ideal choice for both business travelers and those seeking a luxurious getaway. I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a memorable experience in Ahmedabad.

text.text:
We checked into this hotel to kick off our vacation, with assistance from Jaya. Coming from North America, we had high expectations for a comfortable stay—and we're happy to say those expectations were fully met. We enjoyed a wide variety of food, including delicious local Gujarati cuisine, and received all the essentials right upon arrival, including complimentary tea, coffee, and light snacks in our rooms.
Our overall experience was excellent, and I'm pleased to share this with future travelers. My kids even picked up some lovely souvenirs during checkout, adding a special touch to our stay.
I highly recommend this hotel to fellow North Americans and Overseas Citizens of India. It's located in a prime area of Ahmedabad, and you won’t be disappointed.

I’m truly delighted with the integrity and professionalism of the housekeeping team.
I had misplaced my gold ring in the room and realized it only a couple of hours later. I immediately called the hotel to request that no one enter the room until I returned. To my surprise, the room had already been cleaned and the gold ring was safely placed within the room by the housekeeping staff. I have no words to express my gratitude for their honesty and diligence.

Additionally, the service at the restaurant was equally commendable. The young team managed everything efficiently, with warmth and professionalism. Overall, a truly reassuring and pleasant experience.
Thank you!

text.text:
First the good points- Full mark for service & hospitality. The dining service and the front desk service goes all the way to serve customers needs. They are truly exceptional and are a great example of Indian hospitality.

However the rooms and the general lack of up keeping is what let's the hotel down. The lower floor rooms are very dated and in need to maintenance. During the course of 3 days stay we changed 3 rooms due to problems in room cleanliness, ac issue, etc. Biggest concern is that the rooms in 9th floor all have ac condensation issues and you end up with wet and sticky floors all the time. The other issue around general cleanliness and maintenance is obvious- rooms have mould, chipped wooden fixtures, rusted door frames, etc. Even the lifts are outdated with broken/ rusted panel board.
While these issues can easily be ignored in a 3 star or even 4 star hotel, this is not acceptable in a hotel advertising themselves as a 5 star. Additionally I have never seen a 5 star hotel that don't provide amenities like hair dryer as part of standard bathroom fixtures or have concierge or travel assistance services.

Overall my stay was made memorable only by the service of staff and I am not impressed by hotel amenities in any way. Come up with expectation of a 4 star hotel and you will be satisfied.

text.text:
I had a wonderful stay at Hotel Elysian Residency, Shahibag, Ahmedabad and would highly recommend it! The hotel is centrally located, just a short distance from the BAPS Swaminarayan Temple, and easily accessible from both the airport and Kalupur Railway Station. The property is very neat, clean, and conveniently located right on the main road, making it easy to find.

The rooms are spotless and well-maintained, equipped with all the essentials like a hair dryer, air conditioning, LED TV, study table, and amenity kits. I booked my stay through **MakeMyTrip, and both check-in and check-out were seamless.

The pricing is very reasonable for the comfort and service provided — truly great value for money. They also have a pure veg restaurant on-site, which is a big plus. Overall, a fantastic experience with professional service and excellent facilities. I’ll definitely stay here again!

Need to improve: They need to remove dirty spots from the small sofa placed in the room.

The dining experience was fantastic, with a wide variety of delicious dishes served in beautifully designed restaurants. The attention to detail, cleanliness, and overall atmosphere made my stay feel special and relaxing. I would happily return and highly recommend it to others visiting Ahmedabad.

text.text:
I recently visited ITC Narmada - The Luxury Collection in Ahmedabad with a friend, and it was a wonderful experience. The hotel is top-notch, offering luxury and comfort in every aspect. The service was outstanding — the staff were highly professional and ensured our stay was both comfortable and enjoyable.

One unique and convenient feature of this hotel is the in-house liquor shop. Since liquor purchase in Gujarat requires a permit, the hotel assists guests by providing a letter which helps in obtaining a liquor permit easily. This makes it one of the few hassle-free options for buying liquor in Ahmedabad.

Overall, highly recommended for both business and leisure stays!

text.text:
My stay at ITC Narmada was nothing short of exceptional. From the moment I stepped into the grand lobby, I was impressed by the hotel’s elegance, attention to detail, and warm hospitality. The staff were incredibly courteous and professional, ensuring every need was met with a smile.

The rooms are beautifully designed—spacious, immaculately clean, and infused with a sense of calm luxury. Dining at the hotel was a delightful experience; each restaurant offered a unique culinary journey, with impeccable service and exquisite flavors that celebrated the rich heritage of Gujarat and beyond.

What truly sets ITC Narmada apart is its perfect blend of traditional Indian charm and modern sophistication. Every aspect of the hotel, from the thoughtful amenities to the serene ambience, reflects ITC’s commitment to excellence and sustainability.

A heartfelt thank you to the entire team for making my stay so memorable. I look forward to returning soon!

We recently conducted 50th anniversary celebration at Novotel Ahmedabad, and it was an experience to cherish. The event was beautifully managed, with every detail thoughtfully taken care of.

A special thanks to Manager Rinela, who coordinated everything with grace and professionalism. The highlight of the evening — our anniversary cake — was masterfully crafted by Pastry Chef Mohammed Aslam Qureshi, exactly as we envisioned. It was not only stunning but absolutely delicious.

We also deeply appreciate Chef Debojyoti, who personally ensured the entire menu was curated to match our preferences. His commitment and attention to detail truly elevated the celebration.

The team was warm, responsive, and extremely cooperative throughout. Novotel Ahmedabad proved to be the perfect venue for our milestone celebration, and we’re grateful for the impeccable service.

editorialSummary.text: Richly decorated rooms & suites in a palatial hotel offering a posh restaurant, a cafe/bar & a gym.

text.text:
The Hillock is an example of how a hotel should be!

We stayed here on my girlfriend's birthday (17th August), and honestly, it turned into one of the most memorable stays of our life. We got a great deal from Agoda at ₹6800 with breakfast included, and every penny felt worth it.

1️⃣ Ambience & Interiors – The ambience is super classy. The interiors, detailing, and artifacts used around the property are simply marvelous. It gives you the feeling of staying in a boutique luxury hotel.

2️⃣ Rooms – Spacious, elegant, and full of comfort. The lighting is soothing, the bed is large and cozy, and even small details like the study table and decor give a premium vibe.

3️⃣ Washrooms – Believe me, I never thought I’d enjoy a washroom so much! The shower setup was so perfect that I didn’t feel like coming out. Absolute pleasure.

4️⃣ Restaurant – A beautifully designed restaurant offering both international and Indian food. Dinner was à la carte with plenty of delicious options, and the best part – they have 24×7 restaurant service.

5️⃣ Service – This is where The Hillock shines. From the seamless check-in to the restaurant team, housekeeping, and security – everyone goes above and beyond to make you feel valued. The staff is not just professional but genuinely warm and welcoming.

6️⃣ Breakfast Buffet – A grand spread! From sweets to North Indian, South Indian, and even authentic Gujarati dishes – they had it all. We enjoyed it so much that we promised ourselves to come back.

✨ Special Mention – Shiva from the restaurant team. His professionalism, dedication, and ever-smiling service stood out. People like him make hospitality feel personal.

✅ Tips for Future Guests:

Ask for a top-floor room – Better lighting, quieter, and you might get a nice view.

Don’t miss the breakfast – Come hungry, it’s worth it!

Try late-night dining – Since the restaurant is open 24×7, enjoy a midnight meal or dessert.

Special Occasions – Inform them in advance (birthday/anniversary). They go out of their way to make it special.

Nearby Attractions – The location is central, so plan a short evening stroll around. There is a newly opened mall named CBD.

text.text: A beautifully curated dining experience where every plate tells a story. The ambience is refined yet welcoming, and the service attentive without being intrusive. Truly a place where flavors and elegance meet.

originalText.text: A beautifully curated dining experience where every plate tells a story. The ambience is refined yet welcoming, and the service attentive without being intrusive. Truly a place where flavors and elegance meet.

text.text:
I had the pleasure of staying at the Hillock Hotel recently with my family. We have stayed here before on a number of occasions and the hotel itself is spectacular, with elegant interiors, excellent amenities, and a calm, welcoming atmosphere.

However, what truly made our stay exceptional this time, was the outstanding customer service, particularly from Mr. Lohani. We were travelling with our two autistic sons, and it is very important for us to have interconnecting rooms, wherever possible, so we could ensure their comfort and safety. Initially, this posed a challenge, but Mr. Lohani went above and beyond to resolve the situation swiftly and with genuine care.

Thanks to his efforts, we were able to relax and fully enjoy our time at this beautiful hotel, knowing that our boys were safe and close by. It is rare to come across staff who not only provide excellent service but also show such professionalism, understanding and compassion, and for that, we are truly grateful.

The Hillock Hotel is a wonderful place to stay, but it is the people who make it truly memorable. We will certainly return again and wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone visiting Ahmedabad.

text.text:
Our experience was unfortunately quite disappointing. We checked in around 8 PM, and even at that hour, our room was not ready. No welcome drinks were offered upon which was included in our booking.

The front desk staff, particularly the lady who assisted us, did not inform us about any of the inclusions that came with our room booking. Thankfully, we were already aware of them — otherwise, we would have missed out entirely. We also had to wait nearly two hours for the extra bedding we requested, and only one towel was provided for three guests. The lack of basic communication and attentiveness at the front desk was very frustrating.

Cleanliness and Maintenance:
The hygiene standards were far below acceptable. The washroom was especially concerning — the commode had visible urinal stains, which was extremely off-putting. As a result, we avoided using the washroom throughout our stay. There was no hot water in the shower, and the mini fridge had visible fungus inside it. This level of cleanliness is unacceptable for any hotel, let alone one in this price range.

Room Condition:
The room had excessive humidity and moisture, likely due to the air conditioning being left on continuously. The walls felt damp to the touch, making the environment uncomfortable and unhealthy.

Breakfast:
The breakfast was fine — perhaps the only decent part of our stay.

Final Thoughts:
Honestly, we would prefer to stay at a Holiday Inn or Ibis in the future. Not only are they often more affordable than Priza Plaza AHM, but they also consistently offer better service, cleanliness, and guest experience.

I hope the General Manager of the property reads this and work on the accountability followed by rectification because the staff at the front desk and housekeeping is ruining the brand value

text.text:
We booked this hotel through Agoda considering good rating shown.

Extreme disappointment with our recent stay at your hotel. The issues we encountered include:

1. Main door not closing properly, compromising security.
2. Bathroom false ceiling not painted.
3. Poor cleanliness in the toilet.

When we requested a room change, similar issues persisted in the second room. The reception executive assured us that the main door issue would be repaired. However, due to the basic security concerns, we decided to check out immediately and paid for the stay.

Given the hotel's old structure undergoing renovation, we expected better maintenance and attention to detail. Unfortunately, our experience was subpar, and we would not recommend this hotel to others.

text.text:
Stayed at Regenta Central Antarim for a couple of days, booked via MMT. The stay was comfortable – rooms were clean, well-maintained, and overall a pleasant experience. I had to do an early check-out, but later the same day (after missing my train), I requested for a check-in again. The hotel explained that since I had already checked out, a fresh booking with applicable charges was required. The rates offered were the standard weekend ones, even though it was a Monday.

I understand these are hotel policies, though a bit of flexibility would have been appreciated. Still, the stay itself was very good, staff were courteous, and the property is definitely a comfortable option for a stay in Ahmedabad.

text.text:
Quite possibly the worst hotel I’ve ever stayed in.

I came for a wedding of a family member. Prior to our arrival, there were rats found in a room where another family member was staying.

There wasn’t WiFi in the rooms.

The toilet in our room was broken and would continually flush without manual intervention.

Hot water wasn’t available in the shower.

The sheets had visible stains.

There were gaping holes in the ceiling of a common corridor outside of the rooms.

The staff only offered to clean our room once
during our four night stay.

The staff sleep in the common areas early in the morning, on the couches to be used for guests.

Perhaps not all rooms were as bad as the one we stayed in, but I’d avoid this hotel at all costs.

text.text:
Very Disappointing Stay – Not Worth the Price

I recently stayed at Arya Grand Hotel, Ahmedabad, and it was one of the most unpleasant hotel experiences I’ve had.

The washroom was extremely dirty, constantly wet, and had no ventilation, making it feel suffocating and unhygienic throughout our stay. To make matters worse, the water from the washbasin had a foul smell and didn’t feel clean or fresh. This is a serious hygiene concern that cannot be ignored.

There was no Wi-Fi, which was unexpected for a hotel at this price point. The food was a complete disaster – we paid ₹700 for an aloo paratha that was completely average and tasteless. The pizza was even worse – you can get a better one from a roadside vendor.

While the property looks grand from the outside, the maintenance is shockingly poor. At ₹3,000 per night, this was absolutely not worth the price.

Overall, I would not recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a clean, comfortable, or value-for-money stay. I hope the management takes this feedback seriously and improves both their facilities and service.

text.text:
have been trying to reach the reception and room service multiple times — at least 3 to 5 calls — but unfortunately, no one is answering. This is quite disappointing, especially when quick assistance is expected from a hotel.

Also, it was already informed or known that three guests are staying in the room, yet only amenities for one or two people were provided. Basic essentials like towels, toiletries, and water should be arranged accordingly in advance.

While the staff members are polite and well-behaved, they appear to be quite confused and disorganized. It seems there is a lack of proper coordination or training. The room service is also very slow — they take a lot of time to respond or deliver anything, which affects the overall comfort of the stay.

I strongly feel that the hotel management should look into improving the service standards, staff coordination, and guest response time. A little more attention to detail and timely support can make a big difference in the guest experience.

editorialSummary.text: Polished quarters in an upscale hotel offering a restaurant, a spa & a rooftop outdoor pool.

text.text:
I had the opportunity to stay at this hotel for 2 nights during a recent business trip, and the entire experience was exceptional. From the moment I checked in, the staff made me feel welcome with their warm hospitality and professionalism.

The rooms were spacious, well-maintained, and thoughtfully designed for both comfort and convenience. The housekeeping team ensured everything was spotless and replenished daily, which added to the overall comfort of my stay. The in-room amenities and kits provided were of high quality and catered to all my business travel needs.

The food and dining options were outstanding—delicious, fresh, and with a variety that catered to different preferences. I especially appreciated the Lounge Access, which provided a quiet and comfortable space to relax and also conduct informal discussions.

What stood out most was the level of service and support from the staff. They were attentive, quick to respond, and always ready to assist with any request, making the stay smooth and stress-free.

Overall, this hotel exceeded my expectations in every aspect—accommodation, service, food, and amenities. I would highly recommend it to anyone traveling for business or leisure who is looking for a perfect combination of comfort, luxury, and professionalism.

I will never recommend this hotel to everyone, and inform my HR not to work with this hotel.

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Radisson Hotel in Ahmedabad, and I must say, it was an unforgettable experience from start to finish. From the moment I stepped into the lobby to the day of my departure, every aspect of my stay exceeded expectations.

**Front Office:**
The check-in process was seamless and efficient, thanks to the welcoming and professional staff at the front desk. They were attentive to my needs and ensured that all my preferences were accommodated throughout my stay.

**Staff:**
The staff at Radisson Hotel Ahmedabad truly went above and beyond to make my stay enjoyable. From the housekeeping team who kept my room immaculate to the restaurant staff who provided excellent service during meals, everyone was friendly, courteous, and attentive.

**Services:**
The hotel's services were top-notch in every way. Whether I needed assistance with arranging transportation, booking a tour, or simply seeking recommendations for local attractions, the concierge and guest services team were always ready to assist with a smile.

**Food:**
One of the highlights of my stay was the exceptional dining experience at the hotel's restaurants. The variety and quality of the cuisine surpassed my expectations, and each meal was a delight for the senses. From the lavish breakfast buffet to the delectable dinner options, every dish was expertly prepared and served with care.

Overall, my stay at Radisson Hotel Ahmedabad was nothing short of excellent. The combination of luxurious accommodations, impeccable service, and delicious dining options made it a truly memorable experience. I cannot recommend this hotel highly enough to anyone visiting Ahmedabad.

text.text:
My stay at ITC Narmada was nothing short of exceptional. Right from the moment I walked into the hotel, I was impressed by the elegant design, warm hospitality, and attention to detail that made my experience truly memorable.
The rooms were incredibly comfortable—spacious, clean, and beautifully decorated. The bed was super cozy, and the high-quality linens added to the overall luxury. I really appreciated the quietness of the room, which made it easy to relax and unwind after a long day.
The hotel had everything I needed. The gym was well-equipped, and the spa was the perfect place to de-stress. The swimming pool area was serene and well-maintained, offering a great spot to just relax. I also loved how eco-friendly the hotel is, which is a nice touch without compromising on comfort.
The dining experience was one of the highlights. The variety of food, from local Gujarati dishes to international cuisines, was impressive. Every meal I had was fresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented. The breakfast buffet especially stood out with its wide selection—I found myself looking forward to it every morning!
The staff at ITC Narmada were incredibly courteous and attentive. They made sure I felt welcomed and taken care of throughout my stay. Whether it was room service, front desk assistance, or the restaurant staff, everyone was professional.
The hotel’s location is perfect—right in the heart of Ahmedabad, making it easy to explore the city. Despite being centrally located, the hotel felt like a peaceful retreat. The architecture and interior design beautifully reflect the local culture, giving the whole place a warm and luxurious vibe.
ITC Narmada exceeded my expectations in every way. From comfort and luxury to amazing food and top-notch service, it was an incredible experience. I’d definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a memorable stay in Ahmedabad, whether for business or leisure.

I recently visited ITC Narmada - The Luxury Collection in Ahmedabad with a friend, and it was a wonderful experience. The hotel is top-notch, offering luxury and comfort in every aspect. The service was outstanding — the staff were highly professional and ensured our stay was both comfortable and enjoyable.

One unique and convenient feature of this hotel is the in-house liquor shop. Since liquor purchase in Gujarat requires a permit, the hotel assists guests by providing a letter which helps in obtaining a liquor permit easily. This makes it one of the few hassle-free options for buying liquor in Ahmedabad.

Overall, highly recommended for both business and leisure stays!

text.text:
Exceptional Stay, Impeccable Service, and Unforgettable Food Experience!
———————————————————
I had the pleasure of staying at Four Points by Sheraton, Ahmedabad, Gujarat for the past three days, and I must say, it was an outstanding experience from start to finish. As a frequent traveler who values both comfort and quality service, this stay exceeded all my expectations.

From the moment I checked in, I was greeted warmly by the courteous front desk staff, who ensured a smooth and quick check-in process. The room I was provided was spotless, well-appointed, and incredibly comfortable. Everything — from the bedding to the amenities — reflected the high standards of the Marriott brand. The housekeeping team maintained cleanliness impeccably throughout my stay, and that truly added to the overall comfort.

However, what truly made this visit exceptional was the restaurant service and culinary experience. The food at the in-house restaurant was nothing short of phenomenal. I want to especially recognize Chef Sunil Kumar, who is undoubtedly one of the best chefs I’ve come across in all my travels. Every dish he prepared was cooked to perfection — flavorful, fresh, and beautifully presented. His attention to detail and commitment to authentic taste made each meal a memorable one. Whether it was breakfast, lunch, or dinner, I found myself looking forward to the next meal with excitement.

A special mention also goes to Anil, who provided exceptional customer service during my time at the restaurant. His professionalism, warm demeanor, and prompt attention to every need created a welcoming dining environment. His genuine hospitality made me feel truly valued as a guest.

Overall, this property offers everything a traveler could hope for — cleanliness, comfort, superb food, and top-tier hospitality. I left with a sense of satisfaction and gratitude, and I will most definitely return on my future trips to Ahmedabad.

Five stars well-deserved. Highly recommended!

text.text:
Pride Plaza Hotel in Ahmedabad is a luxurious haven that offers a remarkable stay experience for both business and leisure travelers. Located in the heart of the city, this hotel combines modern amenities, impeccable service, and a touch of elegance to create a memorable stay.

One of the first things you'll notice upon entering Pride Plaza is the grand and opulent lobby. The spacious and well-decorated interiors exude an air of sophistication, setting the tone for the entire stay. The courteous and professional staff welcomes you with warm hospitality, making you feel right at home.

The rooms and suites at Pride Plaza are tastefully designed and equipped with all the modern comforts you'd expect from a top-notch hotel. Whether you're staying in a standard room or an executive suite, you'll find a comfortable bed, well-appointed furnishings, and a clean and spacious bathroom. The attention to detail in room design and housekeeping is commendable.

The hotel boasts excellent dining options, including a multi-cuisine restaurant and a specialty restaurant serving delectable Indian and international dishes. The food quality and presentation are top-notch, catering to a wide range of palates.

Pride Plaza is also well-equipped for business travelers, offering state-of-the-art conference facilities and event spaces that can accommodate various group sizes. The professional staff ensures that business meetings and events run seamlessly.

The hotel's fitness center and pool provide a great way to unwind and stay active during your stay. The on-site spa offers a range of rejuvenating treatments and massages, allowing guests to relax and rejuvenate.

In terms of location, Pride Plaza is conveniently situated near key business districts and popular tourist attractions, making it an excellent choice for both business and leisure travelers.

In conclusion, Pride Plaza Hotel in Ahmedabad is a premium accommodation option that excels in providing a luxurious and comfortable experience. Whether you're in the city for work or leisure, this hotel offers a seamless blend of comfort, style, and top-notch service that's bound to leave you with a positive and lasting impression.

text.text:
My recent stay at Pride Plaza Hotel was truly a memorable experience, tailored with luxury and comfort. The moment I stepped into the hotel, I was greeted with warm hospitality and efficiency by the front desk. The check-in process was smooth, and the staff was eager to assist with my luggage and provide information about the hotel amenities.

The room was spacious, elegantly furnished, and exuded a modern yet cozy ambiance. The bed was plush and incredibly comfortable, ensuring restful nights during my stay. The room was equipped with all essential amenities, including a flat-screen TV, a well-stocked minibar, a safe, and complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi, which catered well to both relaxation and work needs.

One of the highlights was the luxurious bathroom, complete with a rain shower and high-quality toiletries. The housekeeping staff maintained the room impeccably, attending to every detail to ensure cleanliness and comfort.

Dining at Pride Plaza was an absolute delight. The breakfast buffet offered a wide array of options, from traditional Indian dishes to continental favorites, beautifully presented and delicious. The on-site restaurant provided an extensive menu that catered to diverse culinary preferences, and the service was prompt and attentive.

The hotel's location is another significant advantage. Conveniently located near major city attractions and business hubs, it made exploring the area and attending my business meetings exceptionally easy. The availability of transportation arranged swiftly by the concierge added to the convenience, enhancing the overall stay experience.

Additionally, the hotel offered a range of leisure facilities, including a well-equipped fitness center and a relaxing spa. I particularly enjoyed a rejuvenating spa treatment that was a perfect way to unwind after a busy day.

While my experience was overwhelmingly positive, there are a few areas for potential enhancement. The air conditioning unit in my room was slightly noisy at times, which might be bothersome to light sleepers. Also, while the Wi-Fi service was generally strong, it could occasionally be intermittent, which might need slight improvement for those reliant on constant connectivity.

In conclusion, my stay at Pride Plaza Hotel was delightful, marked by excellent service, comfortable accommodations, and convenient location. I felt truly valued as a guest due to the attentive and friendly staff who were always eager to assist. I highly recommend Pride Plaza Hotel to anyone visiting the area, be it for business or leisure.

I look forward to returning to Pride Plaza in the future and experiencing the high standard of hospitality once again. Thank you for making my stay so pleasant and memorable.

I recently enjoyed a week-long stay at Hotel Pride Plaza in Ahmedabad, and I must say it was a truly comfortable and remarkable experience. From check-in to dining, the swimming pool, and the training hall arrangement , every aspect of my stay exceeded my expectations.
The quality of the buffet food served during both dinner and breakfast was outstanding in terms of variety, taste, and presentation. The ambiance of the dining hall was soothing and aesthetic, adding to the overall dining experience.
The service staff were exceptionally helpful, polite, and respectful, maintaining the high standards and integrity of Hotel Pride Plaza. I would especially like to acknowledge the exemplary service provided by Miss Priya Singh, Miss Shimran Patel, Mr. Pranav Chandgude,Akanksha Singh and Mr. Vishal. Their dedication and professionalism made my stay even more enjoyable.
I sincerely hope that the hotel continues to uphold this high level of quality service in the future.
Thank you once again for making my stay a memorable one.
With best regards and thanks
Kartik
Guest of Room #725
Pride plaza hotel, Bodakdev,Ahmedabad

text.text:
A 4 star property located a stone throw away from Ahmedabad college. This gives you an opportunity to sample street food post 10pm open as late at 1am on University Street. Besides the hotel are coffee shops- Starbucks, Di Bella etc..that operate till 11pm, even later for conversations and catch ups!
The rooms are spacious with a wardrobe, safe,a queen size bed, television and a work desk. The washroom's glass partitions for wet and dry areas is a touch of class.
Hotel staff are courteous and helpful with packing breakfast as we departed at 6:30am.
The dinner buffet is a wide spread and is 600 pp. Most dishes are on the spicer side, international travellers please note.

text.text:
Arya Grand Hotel offers a variety of venues for destination weddings, get-togethers, marriages, conferences, small parties, pool parties, and New Year celebrations. With around 100 air-conditioned rooms, 2-3 in-house restaurants, and comprehensive catering services, it caters to both intimate and large gatherings. The hotel features 4-5 conference halls, spacious banquet halls, a large parking lot, party plots, and a beautifully maintained garden area. Valet parking is available on request.

The hotel provides both outdoor catering and indoor AC dining, including a grand dining table that can accommodate 20-30 guests—perfect for corporate events and family gatherings of 40-50 people. They customize the setup according to your requirements.

We hosted a farewell party for 40 doctors here and had a fantastic experience. The food was delicious, the poolside ambiance was wonderful, and the service was excellent. As the night progressed, we played Bollywood and Gujarati songs and enjoyed dancing with friends and juniors. The venue also offers outdoor halogen lighting and a sound system.

The pricing is reasonable and offers great value for the services provided. They are flexible with arrangements based on your needs. Thank you for the excellent hospitality and service!

This property lives up to the typical Hilton standards. The rooms are comfortable with a spacious bathroom & a seating area inside the room too. They have a nice restaurant called wave in the 1st floor of the hotel.

The pool is located on the rooftop & is quite narrow but good for doing laps. They also have a well equipped gym on the 12th floor.

In terms of location it’s quite well located & about 40 mins away from the airport. Would recommend this location for short business trips, I stayed here just for one night.

text.text:
Hyatt Ahmedabad: An Oasis of Comfort and Elegance

Stepping into the grand lobby of Hyatt Ahmedabad, I was immediately struck by its elegant ambiance and modern décor. The warm and welcoming staff greeted me with genuine smiles, setting the tone for what would be a truly delightful stay. The check-in process was seamless, and the front desk staff was efficient in providing me with all the necessary information about the hotel's facilities and amenities.

One of the highlights of my stay at Hyatt Ahmedabad was undoubtedly the culinary experience. The hotel offers a range of dining options, each serving delectable dishes prepared with finesse. The breakfast buffet at the in-house restaurant was a culinary journey in itself. It offered an extensive spread of both Indian and international cuisines, catering to diverse palates. The quality of the food was outstanding, and the attentive waitstaff ensured that my dining experience was nothing short of exceptional. Additionally, the hotel's on-site café provided a cozy ambiance, making it the perfect spot to unwind over a cup of freshly brewed coffee and delectable pastries.

During my stay, I had the opportunity to attend a corporate event at Hyatt Ahmedabad. The hotel boasts state-of-the-art meeting rooms and event spaces that are equipped with modern amenities. The event coordination team displayed efficiency and professionalism, ensuring that every aspect of the gathering was flawlessly executed. The seamless corporate event experience, combined with the hotel's commitment to providing top-notch facilities, makes it an ideal choice for business travelers.

The rooms at Hyatt Ahmedabad were an epitome of comfort and elegance. The contemporary interiors were tastefully designed with attention to detail. The king-sized bed with plush linens provided a restful night's sleep, and the spacious work desk offered a functional space for catching up on work. The room also featured modern amenities such as a flat-screen TV, a minibar, and complimentary Wi-Fi, ensuring a comfortable and convenient stay.

Cleanliness is a hallmark of Hyatt Ahmedabad. The housekeeping staff did an impeccable job in maintaining the rooms and the entire hotel premises. The pristine condition of the room was a testament to their dedication to ensuring a hygienic and comfortable environment for guests.

In addition to its exceptional staff and amenities, Hyatt Ahmedabad offers a variety of thoughtful amenities that cater to the needs of its guests. The fitness center, equipped with modern workout equipment, was a boon for fitness enthusiasts like me who didn't want to compromise on their exercise routine while traveling. The rooftop swimming pool offered a refreshing escape from the city's hustle and bustle, providing stunning views of Ahmedabad's skyline. The hotel's spa services allowed me to indulge in some well-deserved relaxation and rejuvenation after a day of exploration.

Hyatt Ahmedabad's location in the heart of the city was a significant advantage. It provided easy access to some of Ahmedabad's most prominent attractions, including the historic Sabarmati Ashram and the vibrant local markets. Whether I wanted to immerse myself in the city's rich history or explore its modern offerings, everything was just a short distance away from the hotel.

In conclusion, my stay at Hyatt Ahmedabad was truly remarkable. The combination of great staff, delicious food, excellent corporate event facilities, pristine rooms, and thoughtful amenities made for an unforgettable experience. Whether for business or leisure, Hyatt Ahmedabad offers a perfect blend of comfort and elegance that caters to the needs of every traveler. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a luxurious and enjoyable stay in Ahmedabad.
